targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__timeGroupAlias(time, $__interval), 
  ROUND(PAPP * $cosphi / 5) * 5 AS "Puissance apparente" 
FROM linky.linky_realtime 
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  MAX(time),
  ${consommation_veille:raw} AS "Consommation veille"
FROM
  linky.linky_realtime;

(SELECT
 "current",
 (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 24 as total_kwh
FROM linky_realtime
WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
UNION
(SELECT 
 "base",
 (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 24 as total_kwh
FROM linky_realtime
WHERE time BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL 2 DAY AND NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)

options.referenceText: comparÃ© Ã  la moyenne du mois

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
 "current",
    (((MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP)) * $prix_hp + (MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) * $prix_hc)  / 1000) + ($abonnement / $nb_days_period) as total_kwh
FROM linky_realtime
WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
UNION
(SELECT 
	"base",
    (((MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP)) * $prix_hp + (MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) * $prix_hc) / 1000 / $nb_days_period) + ($abonnement / $nb_days_period)  as total_kwh
FROM linky_history
WHERE time BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL $nb_days_period DAY AND NOW())

options.referenceText: comparÃ© Ã  la moyenne du mois

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
 "current",
 (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000 as total_kwh
FROM linky_realtime
WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
UNION
(SELECT 
 "base",
 (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / $nb_days_period / 1000 as total_kwh
FROM linky_history
WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL $nb_days_period DAY)

(
  SELECT
    DATE(DATE_FORMAT(MAX(time), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')) as "timestamp",
    (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000 as "total_kwh"
  FROM
    linky_realtime
  WHERE
    time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY
)
UNION
ALL (
  SELECT
    time as "timestamp",
    IFNULL(
      LEAD(counter) OVER (
        ORDER BY
          time
      ) - counter,
      0
    ) AS "total_kwh"
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        time,
        (HCHP + HCHC) / 1000 as counter
      FROM
        linky_history
      WHERE
        DATE(time) >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH
        AND HOUR(time) = 0
        AND MINUTE(time) = 0
        AND DATE(time) <> DATE(time + INTERVAL 1 DAY)
    ) B
)
ORDER BY
  timestamp

SELECT 
 (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / $nb_days_period / 1000 as "Moyenne mois"
FROM linky_history
WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL $nb_days_period DAY

SELECT
    ((MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP)) * 100) / (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) AS "Heures pleines",
    ((MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) * 100) / (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) AS "Heures creuses"
FROM linky.linky_history
WHERE
    time >= (NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

(SELECT 
  "current",
  (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000 as t
FROM linky_history
WHERE time BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL $nb_days_period DAY - INTERVAL 1 HOUR AND NOW())
UNION
(SELECT 
  "base",
  (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000 as t
FROM linky_history
WHERE time BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL $nb_days_period DAY - INTERVAL 1 DAY - INTERVAL 1 HOUR AND NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)

(
SELECT
    TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(MAX(time) - INTERVAL $jour_releve_compteur DAY + INTERVAL IF($jour_releve_compteur<15, 0, 1) MONTH + INTERVAL IF($jour_releve_compteur<15, 0, 1) DAY, '%Y-%m-$jour_releve_compteur 00:00:00')) as "timestamp",
	(MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP)) / 1000 AS "total_kwh_HCHP",
    (MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000 AS "total_kwh_HCHC"
FROM linky_history
WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL $nb_days_period DAY - INTERVAL 1 HOUR
)
UNION
(SELECT
      time as "timestamp", 
      IFNULL(counter_HCHP - LAG(counter_HCHP) OVER (ORDER BY time), 0) AS "total_kwh_HCHP",
      IFNULL(counter_HCHC - LAG(counter_HCHC) OVER (ORDER BY time), 0) AS "total_kwh_HCHC"
FROM
    (SELECT time, HCHP / 1000 as counter_HCHP, HCHC / 1000 as counter_HCHC FROM linky_history
	 WHERE DAY(time) = $jour_releve_compteur AND HOUR(time) = 0 AND MINUTE(time) = 0) as A
)
ORDER BY timestamp

(SELECT
    TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(MAX(time) - INTERVAL $jour_releve_compteur DAY + INTERVAL IF($jour_releve_compteur<15, 0, 1) MONTH + INTERVAL IF($jour_releve_compteur<15, 0, 1) DAY, '%Y-%m-24 00:00:00')) as "timestamp",
      ROUND(AVG(temperature), 1) as "Temperature"
    FROM
      linky.linky_history
WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL $jour_releve_compteur DAY - INTERVAL 1 HOUR
	)
UNION
(SELECT
      TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(MAX(time), '%Y-%m-$jour_releve_compteur 00:00:00')) as "timestamp",
      ROUND(AVG(temperature), 1) as "Temperature"
    FROM
      linky.linky_history
	GROUP BY MONTH(time), YEAR(time))

(
SELECT
    TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(MAX(time), '%Y-%m-$jour_releve_compteur 00:00:00')) as "timestamp",
	(MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP)) / 1000 AS "total_kwh_HCHP",
    (MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000 AS "total_kwh_HCHC"
FROM linky_history
WHERE time BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR - INTERVAL 1 HOUR AND NOW()
)
UNION
(SELECT
      time as "timestamp", 
      IFNULL(counter_HCHP - LAG(counter_HCHP) OVER (ORDER BY time), 0) AS "total_kwh_HCHP",
      IFNULL(counter_HCHC - LAG(counter_HCHC) OVER (ORDER BY time), 0) AS "total_kwh_HCHC"
FROM
    (SELECT time, HCHP / 1000 as counter_HCHP, HCHC / 1000 as counter_HCHC FROM linky_history
	 WHERE DAY(time) = $jour_releve_compteur AND MONTH(time) = 12 AND HOUR(time) = 0 AND MINUTE(time) = 0) as A
)
ORDER BY timestamp

(
SELECT 
  "current",
  (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000 as t
FROM linky_history
WHERE time BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR - INTERVAL 1 HOUR AND NOW())
UNION
(SELECT 
  "base",
  (MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / 1000 as t
FROM linky_history
WHERE time BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR - INTERVAL 1 DAY - INTERVAL 1 HOUR AND NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)

SELECT $cosphi as "Cos Ï", 
       PAPP,
       HCHP/1000 AS "Heures Pleines", 
       HCHC/1000 AS "Heures Creuses"
FROM linky.linky_realtime
ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

list.name: jour_releve_compteur

list.definition: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(time, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i:%s') FROM linky_realtime ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
list.name: last_update
list.query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(time, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i:%s') FROM linky_realtime ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

list.definition: SELECT round(temperature, 1) FROM linky_realtime ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
list.name: last_temperature
list.query: SELECT round(temperature, 1) FROM linky_realtime ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

list.definition: SELECT(MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / (TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, min(time), max(time)) / 3600) / AVG(PAPP) FROM linky_realtime
list.name: cosphi
list.query: SELECT(MAX(HCHP) - MIN(HCHP) + MAX(HCHC) - MIN(HCHC)) / (TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, min(time), max(time)) / 3600) / AVG(PAPP) FROM linky_realtime

list.definition:
SELECT
    CASE WHEN DAYOFMONTH(current_date) <= $jour_releve_compteur
	THEN 
        DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(current_date, interval 1 month), interval $jour_releve_compteur - DAYOFMONTH(current_date) day)))                     
    ELSE
        DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(date_add(current_date, interval $jour_releve_compteur - DAYOFMONTH(current_date) day)))
    END
list.name: nb_days_period
list.query:
SELECT
    CASE WHEN DAYOFMONTH(current_date) <= $jour_releve_compteur
	THEN 
        DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(current_date, interval 1 month), interval $jour_releve_compteur - DAYOFMONTH(current_date) day)))                     
    ELSE
        DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(date_add(current_date, interval $jour_releve_compteur - DAYOFMONTH(current_date) day)))
    END
